content: **quick easy mini amigurumi crochet pattern takes hardly any time at all makes a great keychain zipper pull or cat toy no sew ** craft stackable colorful mini crochet baby octopuses ideal for charming gifts or playful decorations bursting with vibrant hues need yarn super bulky size 6 premier just chenille two 12 mm safety eyes 4 5 mm crochet hook crocheted in continuous spirals 7 rounds the finished item should be about **1 5 x 1 75 inches** **comes with a link to you tube video tutorial **
